title: 16PC Magic Hair Donuts Curler Hairdress Magic Hair Styling Roller Curler DIY Tool for Woman Hair Accessories Small (A)

Rapid hair rollers create curly sexy hair style in minutes. DIY at home and save money and time spending at the salon. Quick and easy way to create beautiful curls at home.
No chemical treatment, protect your hair. High-speed changing magic perm unimaginably. Operation Steps: Control the hair at 60%-70% of humidity of the zone;

In the middle of the prominent part curled your hair, and buttoned the hair curler; Then roll up your hair one by one; At the same time you can use the hairdryer to blow your hair; The next morning or 10 minutes after blowing your hair, so that you can get your perfect hair style.
